instructions:
Cream sugar and shortening. Add eggs, bananas, vanilla and milk. Gradually add flour sifted with soda
and salt. Bake 1 hour in a 350 F oven in a foil lined 9 x 5 inch bread pan. Or bake in 3 foil lined 5 1/2 x 3
inch bread pans for 50 minutes in a 350 F oven. In either case bake until a toothpick tests clean. 
*(Rev.
1/28/92)*
name: Banana Bread
creator: Helen Montgomery
